function.name: LdifDiffWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function compares two LDIF files and reports the differences in LDIF format

function-arg-def.name: sourceLdif
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: LDIF file to use as the source data

function-arg-def.name: targetLdif
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: LDIF file to use as the target data

function-arg-def.name: outputLdif
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: File to which the diffs should be written

function-arg-def.name: ignoreAttrsFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: File containing a list of attributes to ignore when computing the difference

function-arg-def.name: overwriteExisting
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Overwrite existing output file rather than append to it

function-arg-def.name: singleValueChanges
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Write each attribute-level change as a separate modification per attribute value rather than one modification per entry

sequence.script: STAXCode=RC

# GetEntry returns: STAXResult = [cmdRC, cmdResult] if RC == 0: diffsFileSize = int(STAXResult[1]['lowerSize']) msg = 'File: %s Size (bytes): %s' % (outputLdif, diffsFileSize) else: diffsFileSize = MAX_READABLE_SIZE msg = 'Could not retrieve the size of file %s' % outputLdif

else.script:
# diffs file to big to be read diffsFileContent = 'File too big to be read.'
# if the diff file is too big, it means that there ARE # actually some diffs, so we may deduce diffRC = 1 diffRC = 1

if.message: 'NO DIFFERENCES were detected between the source and the target \ LDIF files.'

else.message: 'Source and target LDIF files are DIFFERENT: \n\n%s' % \ diffsFileContent

sequence.call: { 'location' : serverHost, 'dsPath' : serverPath, 'dsInstanceHost' : serverHost, 'dsInstancePort' : server.getPort(), 'dsInstanceDn' : server.getRootDn(), 'dsInstancePswd' : server.getRootPwd(), 'DNToAdd' : entryDn, 'listAttributes' : listAttr }

{ 'location' : otherServer.getHostname(), 'dsPath' : '%s/%s' \ % (otherServer.getDir(), OPENDSNAME), 'dsInstanceHost' : otherServer.getHostname(), 'dsInstancePort' : otherServer.getPort(), 'dsInstanceDn' : otherServer.getRootDn(), 'dsInstancePswd' : otherServer.getRootPwd(), 'dsBaseDN' : entryDn, 'dsFilter' : 'objectclass=*', 'logStderr' : False }
